game.name: Demon Slayer
game.desc: Demon Slayer is an action packed retro pixel art platformer adventure game, with elements of survival strategy, problem solving, and resource management. Set in a fantastic medieval world, you will be immersed in an epic story that unfolds as you progress through the game. You play as Jack, a legendary Demon Slayer on a mission to save mankind, and his true love from the clutches of evil. Jack is equipped with an array of powerful weapons which you will use to fight the wretched monsters that get in your way. Ranging from Jackâ€™s main weapon; a heavy duty chain whip, to a hierarchy of sub weapons. Such as a throwing dagger, a battle axe, a cross boomerang, sacred holy water, and super holy water infused with the blood of a saint. Along the way you will encounter new playable allies with their own skills, abilities, and weapons that will assist you in combating the forces of darkness, and traversing the treacherous environments that you will encounter. The war between good and evil has begun, and the fate of the free world lies in your hands. It is now up to you to vanquish evil from the land, save your true love from the forces of darkness, and achieve glorious victory!
